thread.title: Disney Debuts New Teaser Videos for 'Avatar' Attraction | Hollywood Reporter
thread.title_full: Disney Debuts New Teaser Videos for 'Avatar' Attraction | Hollywood Reporter

title: Disney Debuts New Teaser Videos for 'Avatar' Attraction | Hollywood Reporter
text:
4:06pm PT by THR Staff Disney Debuts New Teaser Videos for 'Avatar' Attraction Disney Parks YouTube/Screengrab The World of Avatar is set to make its debut at Walt Disney World Resort in Orlando this summer. 
The world of Avatar is taking one more step toward reality. 
Though the James Cameron-directed films are not quite ready to return to theaters, Disney has debuted another set of videos teasing the world of Pandora in its parks. 
The World of Avatar is set to make its debut in Disney's Animal Kingdom at Walt Disney World Resort in Orlando this summer. The Disney park has released two new videos with footage highlighting the world of Pandora attraction. 
The first video teases the Na'vi River Journey, "where you can navigate a mystical river," and Avatar Flight of Passage, "where you can fly on a banshee." 
Watch the videos below.
